com.csahmad.moodcloud

Class PostController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csahmad.moodcloud.PostController

  • public class PostController
extends java.lang.Object
    Get Posts from elastic search or add/update Posts using elasticsearch.
    See Also:
    ElasticSearch

      • getFolloweeMoodCounts

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Long> getFolloweeMoodCounts(SearchFilter filter,
                                                                                 Profile follower)
                                                                          throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Return the number of occurrences of each mood for all posts by the followees of the given poster matching the restrictions in the given SearchFilter.

        If filter is null, return the number of occurrences of each mood for all posts.

        Parameters:
        filter - restrictions for which posts to count
        follower - the follower of the followees to restrict posts to
        Returns:
        the number of occurrences of each mood
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        See Also:
        Post.getMood(), Post.setMood(int)

                                                                  throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException

        If filter is null, return the number of occurrences of each mood for all posts.

        Parameters:

        poster - the poster to restrict posts to
        Returns:
        the number of occurrences of each mood
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        See Also:
        Post.getMood(), Post.setMood(int)

      • addOrUpdatePosts

        public void addOrUpdatePosts(Post... posts)
        Add or update the given Posts via elasticsearch.

        If a Post has a null ID, add it. If a Post has a non-null ID, update it.

        Parameters:
        posts - the Posts to add or update

      • getPostFromId

        public Post getPostFromId(java.lang.String id)
                   throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Return the Post that has the given ID.

        Return null if no Post has the given ID.

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the desired Post
        Returns:
        the Post that has the given ID
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException

      • getPosts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Post> getPosts(SearchFilter filter,
                                          int from)
                                   throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Return Posts that match the given filter.

        If filter is null or has no restrictions, return all Posts.

        Parameters:
        filter - restricts which Posts will be returned (defines conditions each Post must satisfy)
        from - set to 0 to get the first x number of results, set to x to get the next x number of results, set to 2x to get the next x number of results after that, and so on
        Returns:
        Posts from the elasticsearch index
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException

      • getFolloweePosts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Post> getFolloweePosts(Profile follower,
                                                  SearchFilter filter,
                                                  int from)
                                           throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Return the Posts of each followee of the given follower.
        Parameters:
        follower - the follower of the followees with the desired posts
        filter - restricts which Posts will be returned (defines conditions each Post must satisfy)
        from - set to 0 to get the first x number of results, set to x to get the next x number of results, set to 2x to get the next x number of results after that, and so on
        Returns:
        the Posts of each followee of the given follower
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException

      • getLatestFolloweePosts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Post> getLatestFolloweePosts(Profile follower,
                                                        SearchFilter filter,
                                                        int from)
                                                 throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Return the latest Post of each followee of the given follower.
        Parameters:
        follower - the follower of the followees with the desired posts
        filter - restricts which Posts will be returned (defines conditions each Post must satisfy)
        from - set to 0 to get the first x number of results, set to x to get the next x number of results, set to 2x to get the next x number of results after that, and so on
        Returns:
        the latest Post of each followee of the given follower
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException

      • getPosts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Post> getPosts(Profile profile,
                                          SearchFilter filter,
                                          int from)
                                   throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Return the Posts associated with the given profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - the poster of the posts to return
        filter - restricts which Posts will be returned (defines conditions each Post must satisfy)
        from - set to 0 to get the first x number of results, set to x to get the next x number of results, set to 2x to get the next x number of results after that, and so on
        Returns:
        the Posts posted by the given profile
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
